overview:
Andrew is a connector, starting a small private tech and advertising professional happy hour in SOMA, SF bringing together his friends and clients to help them answer the tough questions that currently face their businesses through establishing new relationships.

His digital advertising career started in 2007 with Gratis Internet, working in Advertising Operations, Ad Trafficking and Optimization (in-house Social Ad Network, eMail, PPC/CPM arbitrage), Media Buying (PPC/CPM), Account Management, Publisher Management (Affiliate and in-house Social Ad Network) and Product Management (Incentive Site, e-Mail Marketing, Virtual Currency, Social Ad Network) until eventually becoming the General Manager, overseeing Gratis Internet and it’s main product, Gratis Network - an international affiliate network.

His experience at Gratis primed him to lead the business development for their new start up which is entirely focused on Facebook Ads Management. Spruce is a technology and media buying company, Andrew works in both product and business development. Spruce powers the Facebook Ads management for a client base including everything from high-profile startups, eCommerce, social gaming and discount sites to well established world-wide brands.
